attributes.action: Not use public funds or resources on Margaret Thatcher's Funeral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister not to use public funds or resources for Margaret Thatcher's funeral. We consider the decision to provide a large sum of public money to grant Mrs Thatcher a state funeral abhorrent, wasteful and divisive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
